name: Nelson Alarm
address: Multiple locations in Indiana, including Indianapolis
description: Nelson Alarm provides state-of-the-art security systems and reliable 24/7 alarm monitoring for homes and businesses. They have been in operation for nearly 30 years and specialize in custom-designed solutions

name: Alert Alarm
description: Alert Alarm offers alarm systems and security solutions with 24/7 local monitoring services in Northwest Indiana and surrounding areas. They have been in business for over 50 years

name: ADS (Alarm Detection Systems, Inc.)
description: ADS provides state-of-the-art security systems and industry-leading customer service for homes and businesses, with 24/7/365 peace of mind. They have a five-diamond certified central monitoring station

name: Circle City Security Systems Inc.
description: Circle City Security Systems Inc. is a residential and commercial security provider offering 24/7 monitoring with a well-trained team and quality equipment

name: Mytech Security
address: 4974 E County Rd 400 S, Plainfield, Indiana 46168
description: Mytech Security offers dependable 24/7 monitoring services for homes and businesses, backed by a 1-year warranty on parts and labor. They are a family-owned and operated business
